1: O Lord, how my adversaries have increased! Many are rising up against me.
2: Many are saying [b]of my soul, “There is no [c]deliverance for him in God.” [d]Selah.
3: But You, O Lord, are a shield about me, My glory, and the One who lifts my head.
4: I was crying to the Lord with my voice, And He answered me from His holy [e]mountain. Selah.
5: [f]I lay down and slept; I awoke, for the Lord sustains me.
6: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people Who have set themselves against me round about.
7: Arise, O Lord; save me, O my God! For You [g]have smitten all my enemies on the [h]cheek; You [i]have shattered the teeth of the wicked.
8: [j]Salvation belongs to the Lord; Your blessing [k]be upon Your people! Selah.
